lac.data

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.data.Dataset
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArffDataset, CsvDataset, DatDataset

    public abstract class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class used to represent a Dataset in LAC. All the other formats has to extended from it.
